Title: Bronze medal is a result of my 12 years of hard work: Sakshi
Content:
After ending India’s agonising wait for an Olympic medal at the Rio Games with a bronze medal, wrestler Sakshi Malik said it was the result of her 12 years of persistent hard work.
Sakshi on Wednes
Author: PTI
